document.full_text: a "super moon" will rise in the east at sunset on saturday evening. this unusually large full moon -- known as a super "perigee moon" -- will be the biggest in almost 20 years, according to nasa.
document.title: super moon to rise saturday night
lines_and_colors: a "super moon" will rise in the east at sunset on saturday evening. this unusually large full moon -- known as a super "perigee moon" -- will be the biggest in almost 20 years, according to nasa.
